param.name: demo
param.label: Demo Mode
param.description: When true, no saving is allowed

param.name: safe_mode
param.label: Safe Mode
param.description: If PHP on the web server is in safe mode, set this to true. SAFE MODE restrictions: directory creation will not be possible, only the GD library can be used, other libraries require Safe Mode to be off.

param.name: thumbnail_dir
param.label: Thumbnail Directory
param.description: If you do not want to store thumbnails in a directory, set this to false or empty string

param.name: allow_new_dir
param.label: Enable Folder Creation
param.description: Allow the user to create new sub-directories. If this equal true, this parameter is ignored, you can not create directories

param.name: allow_upload
param.label: Enable Image Upload
param.description: Allow the user to upload files.

param.name: allow_edit
param.label: Enable Image Edit
param.description: Allow the user to edit images.

param.name: allow_replace
param.label: Enable Image Replace
param.description: Allow the replacement of the image with a newly uploaded image in the editor dialog.

param.name: allow_newFileName
param.label: Enable Image Rename
param.description: Allow the user to enter a new filename for saving the edited image.

param.name: allow_overwrite
param.label: Enable Image Overiwrite
param.description: Overwrite file of entered filename, if file already exist. Only applies when the the user can enter a new filename.
